Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: 1 Understand the Goal The objective is to create a Process Mining Event Log from provided ERP tables Target output A structured table Markdown with columns Case ID Activity Name Timestamp Resource Actor and other relevant attributes Source tables Orders Order Lines Delivery Invoice Payments Products optional Resources optional

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: 2 Analyze Source Data Orders Case Start order_id Case ID order_date Timestamp for the start of the case sales_person_id Resource Actor for order creation Order Lines Execution order_id Links to case item_picking_date Timestamp for picking picker_id Resource Actor for picking Challenge One order has multiple lines This means multiple Items Picked events one per item Delivery Execution Completion delivery_dispatch_date Timestamp for dispatch carrier_id Resource Actor delivery_arrival_date Timestamp for arrival Challenge order_id 1002 has two records Logic One dispatch event per delivery record One arrival event per delivery record Invoice Financial invoice_issue_date Timestamp billing_person_id Resource Actor Logic One event Invoice Issued per invoice Payments Financial payment_date Timestamp payment_method Attribute Logic One event Payment Received per payment record Products Resources Helpful for expanding the Resource or Actor column names

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: 3 Structure the Logic for each order_id Order 1001 1 Order Created 2024-01-01T09:00:00Z Sales Person Alice Brown 2 Items Picked Item 001 2024-01-02T10:15:00Z Picker David Lin 3 Items Picked Item 002 2024-01-02T11:00:00Z Picker Eva Johnson 4 Dispatch 2024-01-03T08:30:00Z Carrier GlobalTransport 5 Arrived 2024-01-05T14:45:00Z Carrier GlobalTransport 6 Invoice Issued 2024-01-06T09:00:00Z Billing Clerk Gina Carter 7 Payment Received 2024-01-10T11:30:00Z Method Credit Card

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Order 1002 Check Ordering Created Jan 2 12:30 Pick Jan 3 09:45 Jan 3 10:00 Dispatch 1 DLV-5002 Jan 4 07:20 Arrival 1 DLV-5002 Jan 7 16:10 Dispatch 2 DLV-5003 Jan 5 07:00 Arrival 2 DLV-5003 Jan 8 10:00 Invoice 1 Jan 8 10:15 Invoice 2 Jan 10 11:00 Pay 1 Jan 12 Pay 2 Jan 15 Chronology 1 Created 2 Pick 003 3 Pick 005 4 Dispatch 5002 5 Dispatch 5003 Jan 5 Happens before Arrival 5002 Jan 7 6 Invoice 1002 7 Arrival 5002 8 Arrival 5003 Jan 8 9 Invoice 1003 10 Pay 2002 11 Pay 2003

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Order 1004 1 Order Created Jan 4 14:15 Charlie Kim 2 Pick 001 Jan 6 08:00 Eva Johnson No delivery record No invoice record No payment record Note The prompt says Ensure that every event for every order_id is included Since the later tables dont have records for order 1004 there are no subsequent events for this case I will list the Order Created event

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: 4 Final Column Selection Case ID order_id Activity Name Derived as above Timestamp The relevant date from the specific event table Resource Actor Mapped ID from Resources Table Attributes item_id quantity carrier_id invoice_id payment_method order_priority customer_type

Name: Validation - PE
Text: 5 Constructing the Table Mental Draft Iteration Row checks for chronological order per case like for 1002 Dispatch DLV-5002 before Arrival Invoice placements Ordering check 11 comes before 13 Row 14 Dispatch DLV-5003 Timestamp Jan 5 before others 6 Formatting and Review Ensure all keys are joined Check for missing data in 1004 log ends at creation Ensure chronological order is strict per case Check assumptions Order Lines Items Picked event per row Delivery Dispatch and Arrived per row Invoice Invoice Issued per row Payments Payment Received per row

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Refining the Resource column The prompt provides a Resources Table I must use the resource name found there Sales Person IDs SP-001 Alice Brown SP-002 Bob Smith SP-003 Charlie Kim Picker IDs WH-001 David Lin WH-002 Eva Johnson WH-003 Frank Miller Carrier IDs CR-01 GlobalTransport CR-02 FastShip CR-03 AirExpress Billing IDs BL-001 Gina Carter BL-002 Harry Lee BL-003 Irene Park

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Refining Attributes For Order Created Customer ID Customer Type Priority For Items Picked Item ID Quantity For Delivery Carrier Note For Invoice Amount For Payment Method Reference Formatting Markdown Table Columns Case ID Activity Name Timestamp Resource Actor Attributes Grouped logically Self-Correction during generation Make sure the Activity Name is distinct and descriptive Order Created Items Picked add the item description in the attributes for better context if available or stick to item_id Include item_id and quantity
